txt.en: 'What's that? Oh, I suppose I can spare some salve. I'll have to make more soon or I'll run out...'
'Where have you been? Cartwell might have found another supply of salve by now.'

'Leecher Cartwell in Combe has been wasting his healing stores on any rabble or riff-raff that wander through his door. Now, he expects me to resupply him! It will cost him more then a few pennies this time, I can tell you that!\nMake your way over to Brandy Hall in Buckland, and speak with a good for nothing hobbit there by the name of Hodric Bracegirdle. Collect a crate of that oily salve he makes and bring it back to me.'
Leecher Cartwell has ordered some supplies from Bruner Stoutthrush, who has in turn run out of stock.

'Leecher Cartwell in Combe has been wasting his healing stores on any rabble or riff-raff that wander through his door. Now, he expects me to fill his stores! It will cost him more than a few pennies this time, I can tell you that!

'Travel over to Brandy Hall in Buckland and speak with a good-for-naught hobbit there by the name of Hodric Bracegirdle. Get a crate of that oily salve he makes and bring it back to me.

'That salve should satisfy the leech.'
Hodric Bracegirdle lives on the forest side of Brandy Hall in Buckland.\n\nThe hobbit Hoderic Bracegirdle supplies Stoutthrush with the healing salve he sells to Leecher Cartwell.

'What's that? Oh, that villain Stoutthrush! He's been demanding one thing or another of me ever since I lost that wager to him.\n\n'I suppose I can spare some salve. I'll have to make more soon or I'll run out.'
Bruner Stoutthrush does business at the Combe-gate in Bree.\n\nHodric, not entirely happily, gave you the crate Bruner requested. You should bring it to Stoutthrush straight away.
'Hodric Bracegirdle in Buckland you say? It will be a pleasure not to deal with Stoutthrush the next time I need my stores filled!'
'Where have you been? Cartwell might have found another supply of salve by now.'
'Ha! That salve will fetch a handsome price from Leecher Cartwell!'
'Where is the salve? If the leecher finds another source of salve, I won't be able to get as high a price.'
Collect a crate of oily salve from Hodric Bracegirdle
Bring the crate of salve to Bruner Stoutthrush
'Where is the salve? If If the leecher finds another source of salve I won't be able to get as high a price.'
